summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Shilshole Avenue, from 24th Avenue Northwest to West 45th Street; West 45th Street, from Shilshole Avenue to Market Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 65283, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
